attributes.action: Invite Greta Thunberg to make a speech in Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
In the UK, Parliament is sovereign. As our representatives, it is your duty to oversee our Government's handling of this crisis, and to pass the appropriate laws. Well, Government action has been insufficient, and our laws are inadequate for addressing the scope of this challenge. This must change.

In addition to that, Greta Thunberg should be invited to speak in Parliament. On this issue she speaks for all of us. Listen.
attributes.background:
The climate crisis is here. Immediate action is needed to limit its effects. Every citizen has the responsibility to fight for the future of our children and planet, but as individuals we cannot do this alone. We must act together, as a movement.

Greta Thunberg is the voice of this movement.
